CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 22, 1958, pg. 47, reads: "Albert B. Scott... ceramic sculptor wins first prize in Kaufmann's exhibit." Portion of accompanying article reads: "Albert Scott Wins Honors In Ceramics.  A student of Schenley High School, Albert B. Scott, has earned recognition for himself, his teachers, and his school.  Albert's talent in ceramic sculpture was rewarded recently when he won a gold key and a Kaufmann's Award for his model of the head of a young girl..."
TitMainTitle: Schenley High School student Albert B. Scott holding ceramic bust in front of paintings at Scholastic Art exhibition
